column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Miriam - Thank you for your review. I'm sorry you didn't enjoy your experience at JINYA. For starters
column2: did you ask your server to turn up the air conditioning? Since the warmer weather has set in
column3: we don't get too many complaints about the temperature of our restaurant
column4: but regardless of the size or nature of any complaint
column5: we do our best to remedy them if it's within our power.
